title: ‘I Really Wanted to Use Cycling as a Way of Empowering African Women’ – Ashleigh Moolman-Pasio
content:
Moolman-Pasio wants to make cycling more accessible for women across the world through e-racing as well as helping get more African women on bikes.

Read the full article at ‘I Really Wanted to Use Cycling as a Way of Empowering African Women’ – Ashleigh Moolman-Pasio on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
